text:
<!everyone> good morning everyone!
---
i'm excited to tell you that the MarketMuse content team (:wave: <@U01RVQFEFT9>) will be doing an AMA in this very Slack community on Friday at 1pm ET / 10am PT. we'll be talking about quick content wins, updating posts vs creating new ones, how to tackle really competitive keywords, writing with a little help from AI and more. <https://www.addevent.com/event/Ch6577019|you can add this to your calendar here>. this'll be fun, hope to see you there!
---
okay, one more thing for you today. i did a little audit of our channels and (1) changed the names of several and (2) created a few new ones. here is a complete list of all our channels and a brief description of each. if you have ideas for new channels or feedback for existing ones, please do let me know.
• <#CJE3XC0H3|-announcements> - for posts like this one!
• <#CJ2NPFWR0|-intros> - say hello and meet our new members
• <#CJE3XC44V|-job-listings> - a feed of all new job opportunities 
• <#CUYDAGXKR|-b2b-content-chat> - all things b2b. chat strategy, MQLs, lead gen, sales enablement, etc.
• <#CJ7QJ4WKB|-career-advice> - ask questions about your career development, with an option for anonymity
• <#CJ7QQKJ73|-content-strategy-questions> - formerly #ask-a-question. this was kind of vague and mostly about strategy.
• <#C022W2V1Q0Y|-seo-talk> - new channel! :tada: a place to talk optimization, backlinks, site architecture, etc
• <#C0226F0HVV1|agency-life> new channel! :tada: talk about helping your clients win and growing your agency
• <#C021RFDHEMD|all-things-freelance> - new channel! :tada: for freelancers to chat about their businesses. also a great place to find freelance help
• <#C014P2BJLER|ask-me-anything> - will be used mostly for our monthly AMAs (formerly #general)
• <#CN9UCQ92A|content-seo-tools> - find tools to make your life easier
• <#C018DRKH0M9|diversity-and-inclusion> - ask/learn about improving your team's DEI efforts. everything from hiring to style guides and so much more.
• <#C016ENU9KNU|essential-reading> - share the best articles you're reading
• <#CKRJX5U5A|guest-posts> - get an expert quote or find guest posting opportunity (pls no backlink swapping)
• <#C01PKP5C8R1|pets> - :poodle::cat2::parrot::lizard::rabbit2::snake::rooster::tropical_fish:
• <#C012AUSC85C|promotion> - tell us what you're working on
• <#CTF6SG2GP|team-mgmt> - get advice on managing a team
• <#CJE58H0P2|watercooler> - formerly #random. good place to chat about books you're reading, shows you're watching, hobbies you're taking up or anything else
• <#CK1HFB8SD|writing-feedback> - need help on a piece? ask the community for feedback (formerly #ask-for-feedback)
phew, that's quite a list. new folks will be added to these channels by default, but take a look and see which ones you want to be part of. i hope you find this to be helpful. hope everyone has a great day.
rock on :the_horns:,
jimmy
